name: CriminalSearches
tag_list: criminal-records, crime, criminals, sex-offender-finder, neighborhood-watch, crime-statistics, criminal-alerts, free-criminal-searches
overview:
CriminalSearches.com provides free criminal records data.

The site offers a free Criminal History Check | Neighborhood Watch | Sex Offender Finder | Criminal Alerts and Criminal Statistics. Visitors may search by name or address to find information about an individual, or see criminal activities within a particular neighborhood.

Visitors may also sign up for free criminal alerts. This service provides email alerts about new criminal activity for up to 5 individuals. If anyone on the list has new criminal activity on their record, the person who created the list will be notified instantly.
